nodes.text: Letter from Christophsis was a letter from then–Padawan Ahsoka Tano addressed to her friend Tallisibeth Enwandung-Esterhazy during the Battle of Christophsis. Because of its subject matter, it was notable as being a rare firsthand account of one of the important battles during the Clone Wars. The letter eventually ended up among the papers of the Yularen family.
The letter was first appeared in The Essential Guide to Warfare, an extensive guide dedicated to the conflicts in the galaxy, written by Jason Fry and Paul R. Urquhart and released in 2012.
